Lunaticus inamoratus or, The mad lover.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
Printed by Sarah Griffin., London, : 1667.
Verse: "Hark how the welkin thunders; Hark! stand, stand.". "With allowance." Reproduction of original in the British Library.
